div.p: FROM COMEDY CENTRAL'S WORLD NEWS HEADQUARTERS IN NEW YORK, THIS
IS "THE DAILY SHOW" WITH JON STEWART.
>> WELCOME TO "THE DAILY SHOW." I'M JON STEWART.
WE HAVE A GREAT SHOW FOR YOU TONIGHT.
WE'RE THRILLED TO HAVE HIM BACK.
I ALWAYS LOVE TALKING WITH HIM.
WE BEGIN TONIGHT IN THE MIDDLE EAST.
>> YO, YO, YO, WHAT'S UP, SON?
I FOUND THE MAGIC SKULL, WE CAN FINALLY SWITCH BACK TO OUR ORIGINAL BODIES, YO.
>> I DON'T KNOW, BIEBER, I KIND OF LIKE THE BODY OF YOURS.
>> WELL I'VE GOT TO GET OUT OF THIS ONE, YO, IT'S LIKE LIVING IN A HAUNTED HOUSE.
>> FINE, BUT, UM, CAN'T I JUST DO SOMETHING ONE LAST TIME?
(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE) IT'S JUST SO... JUST SO NATURAL.
>> OH, AND HOPE YOU DON'T MIND A TATTOO THAT I LEFT ON YOUR BODY.
(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE) DID HE SAY SOMETHING ABOUT A TATTOO HE GOT ME?
(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE) SERIOUSLY, THOUGH, YOU SHOULD GO SEE THE MOVIE, IT'S QUITE GOOD.
NOT THAT I'M THE TARGET DEMOGRAPHIC.
(LAUGHTER) EVEN THOUGH INSIDE I AM A TEN-YEAR-OLD GIRL.
IT'S BEEN OVER A WEEK SINCE KEITH OLBERMANN AND MSNBC PARTED WAYS LEAVING AN OBER MAN-SHAPED
WHO ON THEIR NETWORK WILL STEP INTO THE BREACH?
WE FIND OUT IN OUR NEW SEGMENT "OLBERTUNITY KNOCKS."
>> HAVE YOU NO SENSE OF DECENCY,
>> Jon: THE MOST OFTEN CONTENDER RACHEL MAD DOE.
RAILS MERCILESSLY AGAINST ALL HER OPPOSE HER VIEW POINT.
>> RICHARD COHEN AUTHOR OF THE BOOK "COMING OUT STRAIGHT,
UNDERSTANDING AND HEALING HOMOSEXUALITY." MR. COHEN, THANK YOU VERY MUCH
>> THANK YOU FOR HAVING ME RACHEL.
(LAUGHTER) WHAT PART OF YOU DISAGREE WITH THIS PERSON DON'T YOU GET?
>> THE LEADING TERRORIST GROUP IN THIS COUNTRY RIGHT NOW IS THE REPUBLICAN PARTY.
A MONKEY POSING AS A NEWSCASTER.
THE TOTAL MINDLESS OR INLY BANKRUPT KNEE JERK HATRED WITHOUT WHICH MICHELLE MALKIN
WOULD BE A BIG BASHED UP BAG OF MEAT WITH LIPSTICK ON IT.
(LAUGHTER) ALL RIGHT, SHE CAN'T DO IT.
>> I HAVE SAID BEFORE THAT SHE HAS ZOMBIE-LIKE QUALITIES.
I CALL HEAR BALLOON HEAD FOR A REASON.
I THINK SHE'S A BALLOON HEAD.
YOU HAVE TO USE THE WORD "BALLOON HEAD." BALLOON HEAD.
>> Jon: IT'S GOOD, BUT I THINK YOU MAY HAVE TO COME UP WITH MORE THAN ONE INSULT.
AND NOT FOR NOTHING, JUDGING BY THE SIZE OF YOUR CRANIUM...
(LAUGHTER) ... I WOULD GO WITH AN INSULT YOU YOURSELF DO NOT SUFFER FROM.
(LAUGHTER) PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN HELIUM HOUSES...
(LAUGHTER) WHAT ABOUT THE GUY WHO GOT KEITH'S OLD TIME SLOT, LAWRENCE O'DONNELL?
>> SOMETHING MUST BE DONE ABOUT THE BULLET CAPACITY OF THESE WEAPONS BUT NEWSPAPERS FROM THE
GUYS, OLER MAN WAS A FIVE POOL PLAYER, WAGE, EGO, WIT,
AFTER YOU DELIVER A RANT, I WANT TO FEEL LIKE YOU NEED TWO WEEKS OFF AND A BLOOD TRANSFUSION.
(LAUGHTER) IS THERE NO ONE ON MSNBC THAT CAN SHOULDER THIS OLBER-BURDEN?
>> EVERYTHING YOU JUST SAID TO ME IS FALSE!
GET THIS IDIOT OFF MY RADIO SHOW!
IT'S ED SCHULTZ HOST OF THE CREATIVELY NAMED "ED SHOW." WHAT'S HE GOT TO OFFER?
I KNOW WHAT THEY WANT TO DO.
THEY WANT TO TAKE DOWN AMERICAN WORKERS.
THEY WANT TO SEE YOU DEAD!
I WILL FIGHT THESE BASTARDS EVERY NIGHT AT 6:00.
THEY'D RATHER MAKE MONEY OFF YOUR DEAD CORPSE!
>> Jon: YES, ONLY ED SCHULTZ CAN HELP RID AMERICA OF NECK ROE FEEL YAK PIMPS.
I LOVE THE RAGE, I LOVE TO SIGH THE INSULTS MORE PERSONAL.
BUT IN A MORE SELF-UNAWARE WAY.
>> REPUBLICAN GOVERNOR OF NEW JERSEY CHRIS CHRISTIE, I MEAN,
THIS GUY IS NOTHING BUT A BIG BULLY.
HE'S A COLD-HEARTED FAT SLOB ANYWAY.
THE BOTTOM LINE IS THAT WHEN HE DOESN'T LIKE WHAT HE HEARS, HE ACCUSES THE OTHER SIDE OF SHOUTING.
IT'S A TYPICAL, TYPICAL RIGHT-WING APPROACH TO THE COMPETITION.
IF THERE'S ONE THING MR. SCHULTZ CAN'T STAND IT'S A HEAVY-SET MAN SHOUTING AT YOU.
(LAUGHTER) I GUESS IF THERE WAS EVER A SHOW CALLED "OLBERMANN'S ID" HE COULD
IT'S CLEAR MSNBC DID NOT PLAN FOR THE EVENTUALITY OF OLER MAN'S DEPARTURE.
TO TRULY BE ASSURE OF A RIGHTFULARY ONE WOULD HAVE TO RAISE THE BROADCASTER FROM
SCRATCH, BEEF FROM THE FINALEST COWS, VINEGAR FROM THE SOUREST GROUPS AND A HUMAN EXPERIMENT AS
